description: This file defines a React component 'RunsTable' that presents a sortable, paginated table showing recent test runs. It includes utility functions for formatting durations and dates, and rendering status badges.

methods.name: formatDuration(seconds)
methods.description: Formats a number of seconds into a human-readable string, e.g., '2m 15s'.

methods.name: formatDate(iso)
methods.description: Converts an ISO string into a localized date string or returns an em dash if invalid.

methods.name: statusBadge(status)
methods.description: Returns an object representing a styled label for the status of a test run.

methods.name: RunsTable({ title = "Recent Test History", subtitle, rows = [], isLoading = false, emptyStateLabel = "No runs found.", onRowClick, })

ctags.name: RunsTable
ctags.signature: ({ title = "Recent Test History", subtitle, rows = [], isLoading = false, emptyStateLabel = "No runs found.", onRowClick, })
